name: Dodge 3D online
description:
Hello,

This is my first ever game, where I'm gonna try to make it as compatible as possible. So for that reason I'm trying to make this game online, then also on desktop, AND on mobile, it is still in early alpha

Original Game

I'd love to hear your suggestions.

Feel free to show my game in a video, please do link the game page.

I don't intend on making this a paid game or adding in-game purchases, this is just a starter project, which isn't even worth any money.

Known bugs/glitches;

  • none

Next update:

-Main Menu music
